name: The Open Market
description:
By Christian Fitzpatrick

A game about playing the stock market to make as much money as you can.

In The Open Market, you play the role of a day trader. Given a starting fund of $10k, a set amount of days to work with, and seven different sectors of the market to invest in, you must analyze the movement of stock prices to ensure you buy and sell at the right time.  Choose your investments wisely and watch the profit roll in.

If you get a good high score, share it! Let's see just how much money it's possible to make in this game.
